con:testCase.name: SMP_001-CreateResource-BasicFlow
con:testCase.con:description:
Create ServiceGroup-Basic Flow-Admin Service Group specified.
- Send PutServiceGroup request for a new receiver participant: duplet participantIdentifier + participantIndentifierScheme. Request is sent within the same network as the SMP. - The URI and attached XML are correctly formed. Certificate of AdminServiceGroup is specified in the HTTP header. - The sender has "Admin SMP" priveledges (via credentials). -> HTTP Response code 201 is returned. -> The correct data is inserted in the DB: ServiceGroup table. Also, Service Group is linked to the Admin Service group. - Send GetServiceGroup for the initial participant duplet (verify that service group is correctly created). -> HTTP Response code 200 is returned. The same previously pushed service goupe is returned. - Send PutServiceMetadata request with certificate of AdminServiceGroup (verify service group is linked to its admin). -> HTTP Response code 200 is returned.

con:configuration.scriptText: log.info "==============================================" log.info "Request sent to the SMP:" log.info new String(messageExchange.getRawRequestData(),"UTF8") log.info "----------------------------------------------" log.info "Response from to the SMP:" log.info new String(messageExchange.getRawResponseData(),"UTF8") log.info "=============================================="

def testType="resource"
SMP.verifyTestResults(context, log, messageExchange, testType)

con:testCase.con:tearDownScript: testRunner.testCase.testSteps['Delete Resource'].run(testRunner, context);

con:testCase.name: SMP_025-Delete SubResource-Basic Flow
con:testCase.con:description:
Create ServiceGroup-Basic Flow-Admin Service Group specified.
- Send PutServiceGroup request for a new receiver participant: duplet participantIdentifier + participantIndentifierScheme. Request is sent within the same network as the SMP. - The URI and attached XML are correctly formed. Certificate of AdminServiceGroup is specified in the HTTP header. - The sender has "Admin SMP" priveledges (via credentials). -> HTTP Response code 201 is returned. -> The correct data is inserted in the DB: ServiceGroup table. Also, Service Group is linked to the Admin Service group. - Send GetServiceGroup for the initial participant duplet (verify that service group is correctly created). -> HTTP Response code 200 is returned. The same previously pushed service goupe is returned. - Send PutServiceMetadata request with certificate of AdminServiceGroup (verify service group is linked to its admin). -> HTTP Response code 200 is returned.
con:testCase.con:tearDownScript: testRunner.testCase.testSteps['Delete subresource-Cleaning'].run(testRunner, context); testRunner.testCase.testSteps['Delete Resource'].run(testRunner, context);

con:testCase.con:description:
Create ServiceGroup-Basic Flow-Admin Service Group specified.
- Send PutServiceGroup request for a new receiver participant: duplet participantIdentifier + participantIndentifierScheme. The same previously pushed service goupe is returned. - Send PutServiceMetadata request with certificate of AdminServiceGroup (verify service group is linked to its admin). -> HTTP Response code 200 is returned.

con:config.script:
def propName="identifiersBehaviour.ParticipantIdentifierScheme.validationRegex" def proValue=null
proValue=SMP.getSmpConfigPropertyValue(log, context, propName) SMP.setSoapUiCustomProperty(log,testRunner, propName, proValue)

def propName="identifiersBehaviour.ParticipantIdentifierScheme.validationRegex" def newValue="^\$|^(?!^.{26})([a-z0-9]+-[a-z0-9]+-[a-z0-9]+)\$|^urn:oasis:names:tc:ebcore:partyid-type:(iso6523|unregistered)(:.+)?\$" def wait=true
SMP.setSmpConfigProperty(log, context, propName, newValue, wait)

def propName="identifiersBehaviour.ParticipantIdentifierScheme.validationRegex" def newValue="^.*\$" def wait=true
SMP.setSmpConfigProperty(log, context, propName, newValue, wait)

con:config.script:

SMP.setSoapUiCustomProperty(log,testRunner, custPropName, username)
SMP.createUser(log, context, username)

def custPropName="username" def username=SMP.getSoapUiCustomProperty(log, context, custPropName) def oldPass="123456" def newPass="DomibusEdel-12345" def outcome="success" def message=""
SMP.UpdateUserPasswordFor(log, context, username, oldPass , newPass, outcome, message)

def custPropName="username" def username=SMP.getSoapUiCustomProperty(log, context, custPropName) def oldPass="123456" def newPass="DomibusEdel-12345" def outcome="success" def message=""
SMP.UpdateUserPasswordFor(log, context, username, oldPass , newPass, outcome, message)

def custPropName="username" def username=SMP.getSoapUiCustomProperty(log, context, custPropName) def authenticationUser=username def authenticationPwd="DomibusEdel-12345" def oldPass="DomibusEdel-12345" def newPass="DomibusEdel-12345" def outcome="failure" def message="Must not be same as existing password"
SMP.UpdateUserPassword(log, context, username, oldPass , newPass, outcome, message, authenticationUser, authenticationPwd)

def custPropName="username" def username=SMP.getSoapUiCustomProperty(log, context, custPropName) def authenticationUser=username def authenticationPwd="DomibusEdel-12345" def oldPass="DomibusEdel-12345" def newPass="DomibusEdel-123456" def outcome="success" def message=""
SMP.UpdateUserPassword(log, context, username, oldPass , newPass, outcome, message, authenticationUser, authenticationPwd)

con:testCase.con:tearDownScript: testRunner.testCase.testSteps['Delete user'].run(testRunner, context);

con:testCase.name: SMP_082- Resource visibility
con:testCase.con:description:
Create ServiceGroup-Basic Flow-Admin Service Group specified.
- Send PutServiceGroup request for a new receiver participant: duplet participantIdentifier + participantIndentifierScheme. Request is sent within the same network as the SMP. - The URI and attached XML are correctly formed. Certificate of AdminServiceGroup is specified in the HTTP header. - The sender has "Admin SMP" priveledges (via credentials). - The resource visibility is set to PUBLIC -> HTTP Response code 201 is returned. - Get the PUBLIC resource -> HTTP Response code 200 is returned. - Delete public resource -> HTTP Response code 200 is returned. - Send PutServiceGroup - Resource-Visibility is set to PRIVATE -> HTTP Response code 200 is returned. - Send GetServiceMetadata request with no authorization -> HTTP Response code 401 is returned. - Delete private resource

con:settings.con:setting: <xml-fragment xmlns:con="http://eviware.com/soapui/config"> <con:entry key="ServiceGroup-Owner" value="${#TestCase#sgOwner}"/> <con:entry key="Resource-Group" value="${#TestSuite#groupDef}"/> <con:entry key="domain" value="${#TestSuite#domainDef}"/> </xml-fragment>

con:configuration.scriptText:
def testType="resource"
SMP.verifyTestResults(context, log, messageExchange, testType)

con:settings.con:setting: <xml-fragment xmlns:con="http://eviware.com/soapui/config"> <con:entry key="Resource-Visibility" value="PRIVATE"/> <con:entry key="ServiceGroup-Owner" value="${#TestCase#sgOwner}"/> <con:entry key="Resource-Group" value="${#TestSuite#groupDef}"/> <con:entry key="domain" value="${#TestSuite#domainDef}"/> </xml-fragment>

con:configuration.scriptText:
def testType="resource"
SMP.verifyTestResults(context, log, messageExchange, testType)

def testType="resource"
SMP.verifyTestResults(context, log, messageExchange, testType)

con:testCase.con:tearDownScript: testRunner.testCase.testSteps['Delete Resource-Cleaning'].run(testRunner, context);

con:testCase.name: SMP_082-Domain-Does not Exist
con:testCase.con:description:
Create ServiceGroup-Basic Flow-Admin Service Group specified.
- Send PutServiceGroup request for a new receiver participant: duplet participantIdentifier + participantIndentifierScheme. Request is sent within the same network as the SMP. - The URI and attached XML are correctly formed. Certificate of AdminServiceGroup is specified in the HTTP header. - The sender has "Admin SMP" priveledges (via credentials). -> HTTP Response code 201 is returned. -> The correct data is inserted in the DB: ServiceGroup table. Also, Service Group is linked to the Admin Service group. - Send GetServiceGroup for the initial participant duplet (verify that service group is correctly created). -> HTTP Response code 200 is returned. The same previously pushed service goupe is returned. - Send PutServiceMetadata request with certificate of AdminServiceGroup (verify service group is linked to its admin). -> HTTP Response code 200 is returned.

con:configuration.scriptText:
def testType="subresource"
SMP.verifyTestResults(context, log, messageExchange, testType)

con:testCase.con:tearDownScript: testRunner.testCase.testSteps['Delete subresource'].run(testRunner, context); testRunner.testCase.testSteps['Delete Resource'].run(testRunner, context);

con:testCase.name: SMP_083-Group-Does not Exist
con:testCase.con:description:
Create ServiceGroup-Basic Flow-Admin Service Group specified.
- Send PutServiceGroup request for a new receiver participant: duplet participantIdentifier + participantIndentifierScheme. Request is sent within the same network as the SMP. - The URI and attached XML are correctly formed. Certificate of AdminServiceGroup is specified in the HTTP header. - The sender has "Admin SMP" priveledges (via credentials). -> HTTP Response code 201 is returned. -> The correct data is inserted in the DB: ServiceGroup table. Also, Service Group is linked to the Admin Service group. - Send GetServiceGroup for the initial participant duplet (verify that service group is correctly created). -> HTTP Response code 200 is returned. The same previously pushed service goupe is returned. - Send PutServiceMetadata request with certificate of AdminServiceGroup (verify service group is linked to its admin). -> HTTP Response code 200 is returned.
con:testCase.con:tearDownScript: testRunner.testCase.testSteps['Delete subresource-cleaning'].run(testRunner, context); testRunner.testCase.testSteps['Delete Resource-cleaning'].run(testRunner, context);

con:testCase.name: SMP_001-Https deployment-Basic Flow
con:testCase.con:description:
Create ServiceGroup-Basic Flow-Admin Service Group specified.
- Send PutServiceGroup request for a new receiver participant: duplet participantIdentifier + participantIndentifierScheme. Request is sent within the same network as the SMP. - The URI and attached XML are correctly formed. Certificate of AdminServiceGroup is specified in the HTTP header. - The sender has "Admin SMP" priveledges (via credentials). -> HTTP Response code 201 is returned. -> The correct data is inserted in the DB: ServiceGroup table. Also, Service Group is linked to the Admin Service group. - Send GetServiceGroup for the initial participant duplet (verify that service group is correctly created). -> HTTP Response code 200 is returned. The same previously pushed service goupe is returned. - Send PutServiceMetadata request with certificate of AdminServiceGroup (verify service group is linked to its admin). -> HTTP Response code 200 is returned.

con:config.script: def custPropName="url" def custPropValue="https://localhost:8987/smp" def level="project" SMP.setSoapUiCustomProperty(log,testRunner, custPropName, custPropValue, level)
def custPropName="url" def custPropValue="http://localhost:8983/smp" def level="project" SMP.setSoapUiCustomProperty(log,testRunner, custPropName, custPropValue, level)

con:testCase.con:tearDownScript: testRunner.testCase.testSteps['Delete subresource-Cleaning'].run(testRunner, context); testRunner.testCase.testSteps['Delete Resource'].run(testRunner, context);
